headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Special Vehicles
content: Once you’ve proved yourself to be a talented and dedicated purveyor of nearly-legitimate vehicles, SecuroServ will be in touch with some more exclusive assignments. Getting hold of these rare, highly unusual and federally prohibited vehicles is no easy task, but they come with rewards to match. And once you’ve proved your worth acquiring them professionally, you’ll be entitled to the SecuroServ trade price if you want one all to yourself.
